translations: n.美人鱼（传说中的）；女子游泳健将

sentences.sentence: No one would buy her knowing that it was the real Little Mermaid.
sentences.translation: 知道这是真正的小美人鱼后，没有人会买她的。

sentences.sentence: It was really rather irritating to children who had never seen a mermaid.
sentences.translation: 对于从未见过美人鱼的孩子们来说，这实在是令人非常恼火。
